definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
karst landform (weathered limestone, often forming caves)

sentences.english: Zhijin unique karst topography, Zhijin reputation at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 织金县拥有独特的喀斯特地形，织金洞享誉国内外。

sentences.english: The Spirit tells me - Fidel Castro will die - in the 90's.
sentences.chinese: 那灵告诉我，喀斯特90年代会死掉。

sentences.english: The farmland is a very precious resources in karst areas.
sentences.chinese: 在喀斯特区域耕地更是十分宝贵的稀缺性资源。

sentences.english: And list the Crodyceps having been discovered in this area during the past years.
sentences.chinese: 并列出了历年来滇黔桂喀斯特地区发现的虫草菌。

sentences.english: Xingwen Karst Geopark, covering roughly 156 square kilometers, is made up of four scenic areas;
sentences.chinese: 兴文喀斯特地质公园占地约为156平方公里。

sentences.english: Karst landscapes are also threatened by limestone quarrying, Toomey said.
sentences.chinese: 图米说，喀斯特景观还受灰岩石开采的威胁。

sentences.english: Karst lakes, a special morphology of fluvial karst, are well developed in Anlong, Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 贵州安龙一带海子较为发育，属流水喀斯特形态。

sentences.english: A lake of southwest Oregon in a volcanic crater of the Cascade Range.
sentences.chinese: 美国俄勒冈州西南部喀斯特山脉一个火山凹湖。

sentences.english: Karst rocky desertification is a major kind of land desertification.
sentences.chinese: 喀斯特石漠化是土地荒漠化的主要类型之一。

sentences.english: GongCheng pattern is a good example for the circular economy of agriculture in Karsts region.
sentences.chinese: 恭城模式是喀斯特地区农业循环经济发展的典范。

sentences.english: The ancient Yelang Country is produced in the karst environment.
sentences.chinese: 古夜郎国植根于喀斯特环境。

sentences.english: This is a rare type of karst topography.
sentences.chinese: 是非常罕见的喀斯特地貌景观。

sentences.english: The core of restoration should focus on ecological optimization of the whole human-land system in Karst region.
sentences.chinese: 喀斯特区域恢复的核心是整体人地系统的生态优化。

sentences.english: The results of this study offer the theoretical foundation for the study of O. violaceus's adaptiblity to Karst.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果为诸葛菜的喀斯特适生性的研究提供依据。

sentences.english: Kasite shrubby grassland is one of the main grassland types in Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 喀斯特灌丛草地是贵州省的主要草地类型之一。

sentences.english: The landform that there is 15% on the earth is karst karst landforms .
sentences.chinese: 地球上有15%的地形是喀斯特岩溶地貌。

definition: karst landform (weathered limestone, often forming caves)
Stone Forest, notable set of limestone formations in Yunnan
Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
Huangguoshu falls, Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
pinyin: Huang2 guo3 shu4 Da4 Pu4 bu4

definition: great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River

Three Parallel Rivers National Park, in mountainous northwest Yunnan World Heritage protected area: the three rivers are Nujian 怒江 or Salween, Jinsha 金沙江 or upper reaches of Changjiang and Lancang 澜沧江 or Mekong
